lines.text:
[after a jumpy Murphy shoots at his own image in a mirror]
Man, that's the first time I ever seen a Texan beat himself to the draw.
At 0500 we'll open up with small arms fire. The 7th will move across at the same time. I'm sure the Jerries will throw some entertainment our way.
I think you can count on it, Lieutenant.

[Observing the starving Italian orphans picking through garbagr cans]
They picked a great time to be born, didn't they?
